source.4af2c0c6:
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.bd285a78:
fig1, ax1 = plt.subplots(2, 5, figsize=(16, 10),gridspec_kw={
        'top' : 1,
        'hspace' : 0.5,
        'right' : 1.5
})
col = list(train.columns)[1:]
categorical=['time_signature','song_popularity','key','audio_mode']
cols=[ele for ele in col if ele not in categorical]
   
index = 0
for i in range(2):
    for j in range(5):
        sns.histplot(ax = ax1[i,j],data = train, x= cols[index], 
                    stat = "density", kde = True)
        index+=1
source.e4439d04:
plt.figure(figsize = (12,12))
mask = np.triu(np.ones_like(train.corr()))
sns.heatmap(train.dropna().corr(), cmap="YlGnBu", annot=True, square=True,mask=mask)
plt.xticks(size = 10)
plt.yticks(size = 10)

col = list(train.columns)[1:]
categorical=['time_signature','key','audio_mode']
cols=[ele for ele in col if ele not in categorical]
sns.set()
sns.pairplot(train[cols], hue = 'song_popularity')
plt.show()
